channel.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
channel.description:
Beside the official HD Pack by Gearbox, are there any fan-made model/texture packs that have higher poly models and higher resolution textures for the enemies and weapons? I'm not talking about the reskins you can find on fpsbanana, because these offer different interpretations, I'm looking for model/texture packs that are still based on the original ones, just how the official HD Pack is still based on the original models.
I would love to see some better quality versions of the Race X aliens and the Op4 weapons :slight_smile:
On a wee side note, are there any mod projects that offer enviromental model/texture packs? Like the ones for Deus Ex and System Shock 2 where there are texture upgrades available.

item.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
You mean their forums? There’s not much there except a few “We’re not dead yet” threads by the mod team and a lot of threads asking when it’s coming out.

There are a scant few WIP pictures to be found but that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Lord Grievous:

Yes I’m aware of the HL Improvement thing, but they haven’t updated in over a year and they seem to be either dead or dying

Their projects have not been updated for over a year, and on their old website you can see some screenshots of their updated models for HL1, but these are simply from the HD Pack that came with Blue Shift!

And I’m mostly interested in any such updates for Op4, now their site does list such a project but there are no screenshots or anything to indicate they’ve even started on this!

As much as I appreciate their effort and intent, the only thing released so far is Blue Shift Unlocked, and that was in 2005, there haven’t been any new updates between then and now!

But thanks anyway

Like I said, look through the forums and you may find all sorts of stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
item.dc:creator: Super_Toast
item.description:
I use the DiamonD HL Pak for HL1. I use one of the later ones (v7 I think), but I can only find v3 on Filefront. It doesn’t affect the environment, but the humans, aliens, and weapons get new models and textures. Link

As for Opposing Force, the only high definition pack I can think of is Op4 Redux. Link

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Yes I’m aware of the HL Improvement thing, but they haven’t updated in over a year and they seem to be either dead or dying

Their projects have not been updated for over a year, and on their old website you can see some screenshots of their updated models for HL1, but these are simply from the HD Pack that came with Blue Shift!

And I’m mostly interested in any such updates for Op4, now their site does list such a project but there are no screenshots or anything to indicate they’ve even started on this!

As much as I appreciate their effort and intent, the only thing released so far is Blue Shift Unlocked, and that was in 2005, there haven’t been any new updates between then and now!

item.title: Half-Life 1 model/texture packs...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Yeah, I’m quite aware of fpsbanana, and while I love some of the alternative weapon skins for HL1/HL2 (I’m using some at the moment), I’m looking for better quality models/textures for HL1/Op4 that are still based on the original ones, just more detailed.
